name: CrazyCircle.
description:
Description:
Your task is to control a crazy circle that always move and you must also avoid all enemy, every time you get hit you become smaller and the control become out of control.

Control:
[W] [A] [S] [D] -> To Move
[esc] -> To Return To Main Menu

Credits :
Music: Spring/Flofflewoffle Flooferwoofer
